entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Methodical_others test JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int crashing #69832
  • Outerloop stress legs triggering on PRs they shouldn't #69829
  • Unhandled SECURITY_STATUS (0x80090016) in SecurityStatusAdapterPal results in InternalException #69828
  • Strange error message from LibraryImport #69827
  • UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests fail on some Mono runtimes #69823
  • Eliminate the need to preserve struct handles for `SIMD` types #69822
    Future
  • It is difficult to determine whether TieredPGO and ReadyToRun are enabled #69820
  • IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() marked as non-nullable even though it can return null values as a LEFT JOIN #69817
  • The BlockingCollection<T> backed by a custom collection doesn't work properly #69816
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for failures due to stack overflow #69810
    7.0.0
  • Strange discrepancies between char[] and string marshaling #69809
    7.0.0
  • Support Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 in JIT rolling build #69807
    Future
  • Test failures in hashing on Browser #69806
    7.0.0
  • Running a simple ASP.NET core application causing Coreclr.dll throwing exception #69805
  • [NativeAOT] FijiTimeZoneTests Fails on NativeAOT #69801
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.Tests.OperatorTests.ExplicitOperators_FromValues failing on Android x86 in rolling build of runtime-extra-platforms #69800
  • Bad performance with Blazor WebAssembly even when using AOT compilation #69797
    7.0.0
  • Mono incorrectly handles floating-point to long conversions on Arm64 #69795
    7.0.0
  • Mono incorrectly handles nuint to floating-point conversions #69794
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Quic.MsQuicException on rolling build of runtime #69792
  • Socket.BeginAccept in .NET 6 throws an unobserved SocketException #69790
  • [wasm][debugger] Differentiate between virtual and new virtual in derived members on GetProperties #69788
    7.0.0
  • `FileSystemEntry.ToSpecifiedFullPath()` returns wrong result when `OriginalRootDirectory` is `X:` #69785
  • Mono does not specify source to utf-8, and fails to build on MBCS locale #69781
  • [API Proposal]: Add TarExtractOptions/TarCreateOptions #69780
  • [API Proposal]: Implement decimal floating-point types that conform to the IEEE 754 standard. #69777
  • Winmm error with latest version of System.Speech package #69776
  • [Analyzer]: Enforce Curiously Recurring Template Pattern in Generic Math interfaces #69775
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_SyncStream.MultipleThreadsLooping #69772

Closed

  • WindowsCryptographicException cannot be serialized #69704
    7.0.0
  • Provide File System Support for Blazor wasm #60907
  • WebAssembly Browser App project fails to run #67236
    7.0.0
  • Duplicate logging in `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host` #69793
  • ARM64 glibc runtime builds on Ubuntu 18.04, not CentOS 7 #69811
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Linq/Linq/Linq.sh` timing out on linux #69518
  • Error using double or float values with WebAssembly #67970
    7.0.0
  • OpenSslCryptographicException: error:03000098:digital envelope routines::invalid digest on CentOS Stream 9 #65874
    7.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper.AddOneArgTypeHelper when using ILGenerator.EmitCall on an interface method with 'in' arguments. #67084
    7.0.0
  • Vector.ConditionalSelect and Vector128.ConditionalSelect don't emit vpblendvb on x64 #67039
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequests_Succeeds times out #55957
    Future
  • runtime-extra-platforms rolling build failure: Docker Internal Server Error - The container operating system does not match the host operating system. #67728
  • .NET Standard 2.1 vs .NET 6 Threading in Blazor WASM #61381
  • Korean language support on WebAssembly regression #69787
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly error "IDBFS is not defined" #65299
  • UTF8 pointer + nuint overloads #68256
  • Test failure: System.ConfigurationTests.AppSettingsTests/AddToAppSettings_Save #21510
    Future
  • Test failure: System.ConfigurationTests.ConfigurationElementCollectionTests/EqualsNullIsFalse #21512
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] test failure: Public_Interop_ExactVersion_BufferContent_Success fails with CONNECTION_IDLE #63009
    7.0.0
  • Support optional client certificates #57308
    7.0.0
  • Audit source-generated marshallers for integer overflow bugs #69532
    7.0.0
  • Source generated interop should be unconditionally ExactSpelling=true #69541
    7.0.0
  • Duplicate ManagedToUnmanagedTransition and UnmanagedToManagedTransition calls in profiler #69717
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup a few more allocations in X.509 #69831
    area-System.Security
  • Remove extraneous diagnostic #69830
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix whitespace in repro project #69825
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Mark IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() as nullable #69821
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Relax the addres exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix value type unboxing bug #69815
    area-System.Reflection
  • Renaming files because they don't reflect the IL code used in the tests #69814
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Reduce unnecessary casting/locals in pinning path #69804
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Annotate System.Runtime tests for NativeAOT #69803
  • Some clean-up of host tests #69802
    area-Host
  • Disable failing MsQuic tests on Windows #69798
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update RHEL and CentOS images #69791
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #69783
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the segment fault within JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState. #69782
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VM calling convention detection for some pinvokes #69774
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • A few tweaks to regex source generator comments / naming for lookbehinds #69773
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Update 'main' branding to release/7.0-preview6 #69813
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow ToCryptographicException to create serializable exceptions #69765
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Use stack buffers and return data to pool in EC point encoding #69812
    area-System.Security
  • merge main into release/7.0-preview5 branch #69824
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow span copy for char arrays instead of manual copy loop #69764
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix memory issues detected with GCC 12.1 #69778
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Revert MSVC changes for libunwind #69750
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reimplement I52/U52 in C, clean up and optimize range checks #69624
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fold System.Private.Interop into CoreLib #69508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support optional client certificates for MsQuicConnection #69603
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Set app context to null on thread detach #69796
    area-VM-meta-mono, mono-mirror, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable LLVM on device runs #69504
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #69668
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors for LA-ABI. #69771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Repro to work with recent changes #69769
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] retrieve results from browser bench sample #69673
  • Fix NRE in EmitCall for DynamicMethod #69027
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add Tizen persons in charge #69799
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Reenable tests for #63746. #69646
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Re-enable some HTTP3 tests #69789
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix the reference assembly so C++/CLI can still utilize System.Runtime #69714
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [HTTP/3] Added another H/3 server #69786
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Skip `COMMA`s when creating non-null assertions #69744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use top level statements in the repro app #69779
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Speed up ValueType.Equals #69768
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix duplicate transition for reverse delegates and expand our profiler tests for transitions to cover this case. #69761
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove destructors #69628
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix negative scenarios #69742
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Some cleanup on X509Certificate #69754
    area-System.Security
  • Add Linux Bionic to official build, for runtime packs #69749
    area-Build-mono
  • Use correct holder for `ThreadLocalModule`. #69762
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers, when LLVM is enabled #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Restore internal tools #69753
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix setting of DacpHeapSegmentData::highAllocMark on DAC side. #69670
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #69751
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the exception's dispatch by EPC. #69712
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resource sattelite assemblies are not generated when using dotnet cli #25632
  • dotnet workload install fails to recognize new workload manifest #25629

Closed

  • Docker buildx with linux/arm64 fails in AzureDevOps since 6.0.300 update #25452
  • [API Compat] Add rule to make sure that enum underlying type matches #23902
    7.0.1xx
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure enum values match #23903
    7.0.1xx
  • What is the intended way to target a specific version of the .NET Runtime? #25220
  • "warning NETSDK1179" shows up even though `--self-contained` is specified along with `--runtime` with .NET 7.3-preview.4 #25644

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement new flag for ignoreing apphosts in dotnet run #25647
    Area-CLI
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Update pre-release label to servicing #25641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25626
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • add rules to make sure enums match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1788494 #25599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define 'DeploymentResponse' to parse Zip Deploy status response #25600
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Preview 6 branding #25621
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25619
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace hardcoded error string in source with string from resources #25372
    localization, area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: UTF-8 Literal Pattern Matching Support #6161
    Any Time

Closed

  • [Proposal] Strict switch requiring to handle all possible options (if applicable) #6163

PullRequests

Created

  • Tweak numeric IntPtr spec #6167

Merged

  • Spec out numeric IntPtr #6031
  • Fix typo #6162

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for nested `fixed`/`using` statements without blocks #61518
  • A change for natural type of a UTF-8 string literal to `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` breaks several IDE tests #61517
  • Nullability warning disappears when commenting out *seemingly* unrelated code #61516
  • Consider filtering `RequiredMembers` attribute in compiler layer/API #61511
    C# 11.0
  • Local named "required" in top-level statements #61510
    C# 11.0
  • Document the best practice for getting text from a syntax in source generators #61506
  • [BUG] SymbolInfo resolution on double generic constraint method should return .Symbol but is null #61504
  • ReassignedVariable classifier crashed #61503
  • Usings via compilation options should bring source types into scope #61502
  • Defining System.Void in compilation suppresses error about usage of System.Void #61500

Closed

  • Roslyn looks to emit incorrect IL for `nuint -> double` and `nuint -> float` #60714
    17.3
  • Compiler StackOverflow #42361
  • Roslyn fails to take into account lifted operators' behavior resulting in false postivie nulalbility warnings #61361
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify error handling and notifications in rename. #61515
    Area-IDE
  • Fix AbstractLanguageService constructor #61513
    Area-IDE
  • Unify the final state management processing in inline-rename. #61512
    Area-IDE
  • Fix setup authoring bug #61508
    Area-Compilers
  • Skip EndToEndTests.Constraints to unblock PRs #61507
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Bring main-vs-deps back #61514
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Simplify rename implementation #61509
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improvements to the background compiler component #61497
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use assignabiilty instead of subclass test in extension loader #61505
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' to 'features/documentoutline' #61501
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Update versions to use most recent LanguageServer changes. #61496
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Extract checking for generic constraint context to extension method #61485
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Utf8StringLiteral conversion #61481
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Prepare VB iterators for EnC support #61488
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61381
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine InvalidProcessPath_ExpectServerError #41856
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #41853
    Test failures
  • Link in gRPC template about MacOS support points to .NET Core 3.1 version of the doc #41852
  • Quarantine ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #41850
    Test failures
  • Enable an XSS Prefix to JSON formatted output. #41848
  • Quarantine SetIISLimitMaxRequestBodySizeE2EWorksWithIntMaxValue #41845
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError #41843
    7.0-preview6
  • Building the .NET MAUI Repo for Blazor Hybrid #41842
  • Getting Started with Blazor Hybrid #41841
  • Add in-library support for DisplayFormat Attribute on Blazor model properties #41840
  • Set authorization for all areas #41839
  • Data Annotation Extensions #41836
  • Xamarin Android & Websockets #41835
  • No SignalR server ping when using WebHost and IHostApplicationLifetime #41833
  • Consider increasing stream limits defaults for HTTP/3 #41831
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .NET 6 Web API not working without .NET Core 2.1 Runtime in the server. #41837

Closed

  • Quarantine ClientDisconnectsWithoutCompletingClientResultOnSecondServer #41858
  • Add logging in RedisCache #41723
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor Server app not terminating circuit as expected when an exception is rethrown in an event handler #37814
    6.0.x
  • Allow parameter and return types of route handler delegates (API Controllers) to contribute to endpoint metadata #41421
    7.0-preview6
  • How to properly write an implementation of the IClaimsTransformation interface in ASP.NET core 6 ? #41440
    Discussions
  • SignalR passing header in in-browser usage #41834
  • The dotnetsdk container dev-certs appear broken, (5.0-windowsservercore-ltsc2019) #33972
    Backlog
  • @microsoft/signalr -> Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor in eventsource/eventsource prior to v2.0.2 #41829
  • [Route Groups] Rename GroupRouteBuilder to RouteGroupBuilder #41781
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine InvalidProcessPath_ExpectServerError #41857
    area-runtime
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #41854
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Quarantine ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #41851
    area-runtime
  • DataProtection use 6.0 app discriminator trailing slash format #41849
    area-dataprotection
  • Quarantines SetIISLimitMaxRequestBodySizeE2EWorksWithIntMaxValue #41846
    area-runtime
  • Blazor router handle base URLs without trailing slash plus query/hash #41838
    area-blazor
  • Add overloads to WithTags and others targeting IEndpointConventionBuilder #41830
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Quarantine ServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError #41844
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Add logging to M.E.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #41769
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • Refactor "Routing/Builder" methods pre conditions #41783
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Rename GroupRouteBuilder to RouteGroupBuilder #41822
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-preview6 #41805
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Handle spaces after request line #41823
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix line endings for SPA proxy script on MacOS #41821
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.6

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make GCDump tool available as a library #3092

PullRequests

Merged

  • SOS fixes for regions #3062

Updated

  • Add big-endian support to Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #3090

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Putting a GraphicsView inside a ScrollView prevents DragInteraction events on Android #7483
  • Elements in same layout doesn't response IsVisible changes [iOS][Mac] #7482
  • ImageButton does not render Image source for Current Theme Colors #7481
  • BlazorWebView on Windows Forms locks CSS files while the app is running #7479
  • PushModalAsync method does not respond in OnAppearing method #7478
  • Android does not detect physical devices, emulators do not deploy #7477
  • CarouselView does not scroll #7476
  • Border does not clip when stroke shape is provided in iOS and maccatalyst #7475
  • Application crashes on Startup if installed as MSIX package #7473
  • Large space above and below Carousel View #7472
  • [Android] Stream.Length is not supported from asset #7471
  • Numeric Keyboard not working with DisplayPromptAsync #7470
  • Blazor CSS Isolation bundle is not deployed to local iOS device #7468
  • GestureRecognizers #7466
  • MediaPicker not working on Windows #7465
  • DynamicResource TextColor doesn't work on labels with formatted string #7464
  • Add missing MAUI API docs #7463
  • ANDROID: apk release version is differ from Debug Mode (GA) #7461
  • Shell.NavBarIsVisible does not update on hot reload on Android 8 #7459

Closed

  • EntityFrameworkCore install errors #7436
  • Blazor Hybrid WebView not able to Obtain GPS Location #4768
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Document how to customize WebView settings in a Blazor MAUI app #6823
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Image Clipping issues in Border #7460
  • Border.Stroke Shape is not fully displayed #7448
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Make Stable version the current version in Bug Report #7474
  • Modal is currently broken on WinUI #7307
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Changing ImageSource in MAUI app causes flicker on Windows #6962
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Checkboxes Have a Default Right Margin of 100 #6160
    6.0.300-servicing
  • HarmonyOS #7462

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolving TableView/ListView issues #7485

Merged

  • Remove Unsupported "!!" null-checking syntax from BlazorWebView #7484
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22229.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22274.2 #7440
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Migration from 1.0.8 to 1.0.10 #7469
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix issues clipping content in Border #7467
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Update bug template to list 6.0 GA #7480
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix WinUI Modal to work with lack of root panel #7452
    platform/windows 🪟, area/modal, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix cell size changed on CollectionView #7447
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite Query: Consider translating Sum to TOTAL #28101
  • Query: Reduce indentation in SqlTranslator #28098
  • Query: Provide a good story for calling into aggregate method call translator from QueryableMethodTranslator #28097
    7.0.0
  • Table-per-concrete-type (TPC) mapping no database generated identity column #28096
  • Not null sql column with -1 default value #28094
  • NavigationBaseIncludeIgnored exception raised when a class and its navigational property are of the same type. #28093

Closed

  • SQLite Query: Translate string.Join and Concat #28100
  • Full support for custom provider aggregate functions #22957
    7.0.0
  • .Where method cannot translate expression tree, despite the expression being correct #28095
  • ArgumentException thrown When GroupJoin is applied on a DbSet as a first join and NOT when applied as a second or later #27343
    7.0.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Provide a way to translate aggregate methods on top level #28102
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Query: Remove the requirement that instance or first argument would b… #28099
    auto-merge
  • Query: Add support for custom aggregate operators #28092
    auto-merge
  • Query: Use accurate generic types in group join flattening #28063
    auto-merge
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-preview6 #28087
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
  • SqlServer: Throw for split query with skip without order by #28056
    auto-merge
